sections.heading: Buildings; repair, rehabilitate, or demolish; remove; cost; special assessment; civil action
sections.text: If any owner of any building or structure fails, neglects, or refuses to comply with notice by or on behalf of any city or village to repair, rehabilitate, or demolish and remove a building or structure whic

sections.heading: applies to and authorizes an appeal from a special assessment levied under the authority of subdivision (1) of this section
sections.text: Main St Properties v. City of Bellevue, 309 Neb. 738, 962 N.W.2d 333 (2021).
